com.dotmarketing.portlets.fileassets.business

Class FileAssetAPIImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotmarketing.portlets.fileassets.business.FileAssetAPIImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileAssetAPI

    public class FileAssetAPIImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileAssetAPI
    This class is a bridge impl that will support the older com.dotmarketing.portlets.file.model.File as well as the new Contentlet based files
    Author:
    will

                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: FileAssetAPI
        Takes the content metadata file and loads its content in a string. It handles compression gzip, bzip2 or none using Tika to detect it based on the file header.
